title: VALORANT Pros React: New Agent

description.body:
We gave the Masters Tokyo pros a sneak peek of the new VALORANT Agent and they had some big things to say. Don’t miss their thoughts as they consider what this new Sentinel could mean for the meta of VALORANT!

Be sure to watch the Masters Tokyo Grand Final live on June 25th for a first look at the gameplay and cinematic debut of VALORANT’s newest Sentinel, along with an overview with VALORANT developers.
